name: TotalColectomy
title: Total Colectomy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a total colectomy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a total colectomy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent partial colectomies.)
